description.ms: Lambat bukan masalah. Lambat tu gejala penyakit. Penyakitnya malas.
description.en: Being late is not the problem. Itâ€™s a symptom. The disease is laziness.

action.ms: Pak Leman sedang memarahi Pak Mail yang lambat
action.en: Pak Leman scolding Pak Mail for being late

extra_text.en: A Friday morning full of reminders

Pak Leman.ms: Mail, kau ingat masjid ni hotel ke?
Pak Leman.en: Mail, you think this mosque is a hotel?

Pak Mail.en: Sorry, Lem... just a bit late.
